content: simbelmynë is designed specifically for the moogly 2017 cal the delicate floral center and lightly lacy rounds make this afghan block look intricate but it s really quite easy to make the pattern uses only chains single half double and double crochets and works up quickly it s perfect for a beginner who s ready to see just what else can be done with basic stitches - or for an experienced crocheter to breeze through designer s note if you ve made my patterns before you ll want to take note that this was designed with a larger hook and has a finished per side stitch count of 36 not my usual stitch count
